item.title: [Migrated] Multiple additions for registration agencies submitted through pull requests
item.dc:creator: petyakangalova
item.description:
@stevieflow@timdavies I am just following-up on some outstanding pull requests which actually relate to the email I sent to Myroslav last week, informing him about the org-id project.

I checked a few of the new registration agencies and they are not currently in the org-id.guide list. I wanted to check whether you plan to review them and integrate in the org-id.guide?

Read full topic
